formattedAddress: 338 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 338 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10016-0937, USA

originalText.text:
Decided to try the signature dish Dimsum platter.
The dumplings and rolls were really big and actually 9 was really more than enough for lunch. 9 dim sums were supposed to give an overview of "sweet and sour" offerings and most of them were really good.
Based on this taster set I would go with crispy shrimp balls next time

originalText.text: Amazing dim sum place! The foods were awesome, so flavorful! They also care a lot about take-out orders, the service is overall top-notch.

text.text: Amazing dim sum place! The foods were awesome, so flavorful! They also care a lot about take-out orders, the service is overall top-notch.

originalText.text:
Yesterday I was craving for Cantonese lobster, I went to Shun Lee West and guess what they did not have lobsters, too expensive they said.

Today I stopped by at the local Dimsum garden. I had great fun with the lobster. David has accommodated me and cook the lobster Cantonese style, for a little bit extra I added some noodles....the result I great lobster. They have liquor license now ( I did not enjoy Sapporo beer that much ) but the rest was great at a great price....I really really recommend it. I am posting the pictures for you to judge. Thank you David for being so accommodating.

I have been coming here even before Google maps recognized it. They have a testing platter that is very popular. I prefer anything with shrimp, you can see the shrimps and the dumplings are completely full with them. The Pan fried one ask to be slightly pan fried. Today the kitchen chef Kang was excellent. I have tried other diches the Seafood Chow Fen, the sticky rice, the Shanghai soup...all very good. Come now that the restaurant has just opened ( well a few months ago). They can be a little bit inconsistent but they are really good. The service is fast and polite. I have not taken out, I like the place. Good adicion to the neighborhood.

originalText.text: Nice variety & value. Some things better than others but all in all a good spot! Service was great, AC was much appreciated after a long hot day of walking, I recommend the crab soup dumplings - yum.

text.text: Nice variety & value. Some things better than others but all in all a good spot! Service was great, AC was much appreciated after a long hot day of walking, I recommend the crab soup dumplings - yum.

originalText.text:
Cleanliness 4. Service 4. Food 3.5. Interior 4.

Enjoyed my experience, speed of service and the different vibe / decorations of a not typically decorated Chinese restaurant.

Not sure if the intentions are to be fast casual but has the feel.

The food score reference is relative to how many competing options there are in this category.

Don’t let my score set the wrong impression. It’s above average and I would certainly go back. I would recommend it if you are in the area but not as a point destination.
